title: Pimms punch
description: This Pimms recipe has an extra kick from the fruity cider - perfect for summer barbecues or picnics.

default: 3 handfuls mixed fruit pieces (such as orange, lemon, lime, strawberries)

steps: Pour the cider into large jug or punch bowl
Add a couple of straws and the mixed fresh fruit pieces, then gently pour the Pimms on top of the cider to create a separate layer.
